title: Input schema for the sitemap monitor.

emailNotification.title: Email address for notification
emailNotification.description: Email address where you want to get the notification

isRecursive.title: Recursive crawling
isRecursive.description: If checked then scraper visit all parent sitemaps and include them in monitor.e

skipIntroEmail.title: Skip intro email
skipIntroEmail.description: If checked then scraper do not send mail during the first run.

monitor.title: Monitor changes
monitor.description: Select what you want to monitor
enumTitles: Only URLs with last modified changes

includeUrlsRegexp.title: Include URLs
includeUrlsRegexp.description: Include URLs by regexp. By default all URLs are included, if this value is empty.

excludeUrlsRegexps.title: Exclude URLs by multiple regexps
excludeUrlsRegexps.description: The field is hidden simple regexp is good in UI, but we need to keep this for API

includeUrlsRegexps.title: Include URLs by multiple regexps
includeUrlsRegexps.description: The field is hidden simple regexp is good in UI, but we need to keep this for API
